function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Continuing transmission of P. vivax by indigenous vectors in areas with permissive environmental and climatic conditions","Impact":"Potential re-emergence of malaria in Greece","Mitigation":"Implement targeted malaria control efforts in specific environmentally suitable areas","Technologies":"NLDA (non-linear discriminant analysis) available in eRiskMapper version 1.1.4","People":"Local populations in areas with permissive environmental and climatic conditions","Owner":"Health authorities and local government"},{"Description":"Exclusion of cases with travel history from the analysis","Impact":"Possibility of underestimating the areas environmentally suitable for autochthonous malaria transmission","Mitigation":"Include cases with travel history in the analysis and assess the impact of travel history on the transmission of malaria","Technologies":"Health record databases and travel history data collection","People":"Epidemiologists and public health officials","Owner":"Health authorities and research institutions"},{"Description":"Reliance on geo-referenced environmental and climatic information for spatial modeling","Impact":"Risk of inaccurate or incomplete data leading to misidentification of areas at risk for malaria re-emergence","Mitigation":"Regular validation of environmental and climatic data sources and integration of multiple data sets for robust spatial modeling","Technologies":"GIS (Geographic Information System) software and data validation tools","People":"Data scientists and environmental researchers","Owner":"Research institutions and government agencies"}]}
